alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Chester; Laurens; Spartanburg; Union; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 7:44PM EST until March 03 at 8:45PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Laurens County in Upstate South Carolina... Chester County in Upstate South Carolina... York County in Upstate South Carolina... Southeastern Spartanburg County in Upstate South Carolina... Southeastern Cherokee County in Upstate South Carolina... Union County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 845 PM EST. * At 744 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Spartanburg to 16 miles west of Union to 3 miles west of Laurens, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Rock Hill, Laurens, Union, York, Chester, Fort Mill, Clinton, Tega Cay, Newport and Pacolet. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for Upstate South Carolina. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. A few trees and power lines will be blown down in the warned area. Storms will be accompanied by brief heavy rainfall, and little or no lightning. Seek shelter inside an interior room. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.

area.areaDesc: Cherokee; Chester; Laurens; Spartanburg; Union; York
